body_html: @colesbury It seems a bit difficult to make an inline method on Tensor which references a non-virtual inlinable function in Type, as in the Tensor header Type is not a fully defined type. Maybe we can forward declare it and then define the method body somewhere else in the headers?
body_text: @colesbury It seems a bit difficult to make an inline method on Tensor which references a non-virtual inlinable function in Type, as in the Tensor header Type is not a fully defined type. Maybe we can forward declare it and then define the method body somewhere else in the headers?
body: @colesbury It seems a bit difficult to make an inline method on `Tensor` which references a non-virtual inlinable function in `Type`, as in the `Tensor` header `Type` is not a fully defined type. Maybe we can forward declare it and then define the method body somewhere else in the headers?
